briefTitle: An Eight-week Randomized,Double-blind Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Fixed-dose Combinations of T80+A5 Versus A5 Monotherapy in Patients With Hypertension Who Fail to Respond Adequately to Treatment With A5 Monotherapy
officialTitle: 8 Week Randomised Double-blind Study to Compare the Efficacy and Safety of Telmisartan 80mg+ Amlodipine 5 mg vs. Amlodipine 5mg Monotherapy in Patients With Hypertension Who Fail to Respond Adequately to Treatment With Amlodipine 5mg Monotherapy
summary: The primary objectives of this trial is to demonstrate that the fixed-dose combination of telmisartan 80mg plus amlodipine 5mg (T80/A5) is superior to amlodipine 5mg (A5) in reducing seated trough diastolic blood pressure (DBP) at 8 weeks.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in DBP After 8 Weeks of Treatment
